title: I Balloons
subtitle: Video game for iOS and Android developed with Unity3D and C#
description: Tap on multiple colorful balloons to pop them all! The game will test your reflexes and your patience. It features colorful and friendly visuals and progressive levels.

title: Women in IT
description: This conference explores the historical and current contributions of women in computing, highlights the challenges posed by gender stereotypes, and examines ongoing efforts to promote greater diversity and inclusion in the tech field.

title: Raqyx
subtitle: Video game for iOS and Android developed with Unity3D and C#
description: Players navigate a dynamic space, strategically creating territories while avoiding ennemies. The game features immersive visuals, progressive levels, and an engaging 8-bit soundtrack, offering a unique and enjoyable gaming adventure.
